column6:
Storm soars solo! The sinister Shadow King is desperate to escape from the mental prison he was placed in centuries ago - and he'll destroy Storm to do it! But will his freedom also unleash the horrifying swarm of the alien Brood? And will even the X-Men be enough to battle a being who has plotted our death and destruction for ages? ,2007,12
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Tyler Kirkham | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Yanick Paquette
